text: James B. Russell (January 30, 1946 - September 13, 2022) was an American journalist, producer, and executive. He created national programs for all three public radio networks: National Public Radio, Public Radio International and American Public Media, as well as for PBS. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Journalists from Connecticut Category:Writers from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Jim Russell (journalist)
